error.message: Call to deprecated function db_update(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Instead, get a database connection injected into your service from the container and call update() on it. For example,

Usage of deprecated trait Drupal\Core\Routing\LinkGeneratorTrait in class Drupal\dibs\DibsTransactionListBuilder. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Link instead.
Call to deprecated method l() of class Drupal\dibs\DibsTransactionListBuilder. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Link::fromTextAndUrl() instead.

Call to deprecated method entityManager() of class Drupal. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal::entityTypeManager() instead in most cases. If the needed method is not on \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityTypeManagerInterface, see the deprecated \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityManager to find the correct interface or service.
Call to deprecated method getUrlGenerator() of class Drupal\Core\Form\FormBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use the url_generator service instead.

Call to deprecated method getUrlGenerator() of class Drupal\Core\Form\FormBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use the url_generator service instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to dibs.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
